original_text: The Lord caused the king to have a bad disease in his skin. He had the disease until the day that he died. He lived in a house away from other people. His son Jotham had authority in the palace and he ruled the people of Judah.
korean_text: 여호와께서 왕을 치셨으므로 그가 죽는 날까지 나병환자가 되어 별궁에 거하고 왕자 요담이 왕궁을 다스리며 그 땅의 백성을 치리하였더라

sentences.original_text: The Lord caused the king to have a bad disease
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 왕에게 심각한 질병이 생기게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: to have a bad disease in his skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 피부에 심각한 질병이 생기게 하셨다

sentences.original_text: He had the disease until the day that he died
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 죽는 날까지 그 질병을 앓았다

sentences.original_text: He lived in a house away from other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다른 사람들과 떨어진 집에서 살았다

sentences.original_text: His son Jotham had authority in the palace
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 요담이 궁에서 권세를 가졌다

sentences.original_text: and he ruled the people of Judah
